Commands.Expression: RUN set -ex   && for key in     94AE36675C464D64BAFA68DD7434390BDBE9B9C5     FD3A5288F042B6850C66B31F09FE44734EB7990E     71DCFD284A79C3B38668286BC97EC7A07EDE3FC1     DD8F2338BAE7501E3DD5AC78C273792F7D83545D     C4F0DFFF4E8C1A8236409D08E73BC641CC11F4C8     B9AE9905FFD7803F25714661B63B535A4C206CA9     56730D5401028683275BD23C23EFEFE93C4CFFFE     77984A986EBC2AA786BC0F66B01FBB92821C587A   ; do     gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key";   done
Commands.Name: onbuild

Commands.Expression: RUN curl -SLO "https://nodejs.org/dist/v$NODE_VERSION/node-v$NODE_VERSION-linux-x64.tar.gz"   && curl -SLO "https://nodejs.org/dist/v$NODE_VERSION/SHASUMS256.txt.asc"   && gpg --verify SHASUMS256.txt.asc   && grep " node-v$NODE_VERSION-linux-x64.tar.gz\$" SHASUMS256.txt.asc | sha256sum -c -   && tar -xzf "node-v$NODE_VERSION-linux-x64.tar.gz" -C /usr/local --strip-components=1   && rm "node-v$NODE_VERSION-linux-x64.tar.gz" SHASUMS256.txt.asc
Commands.Name: onbuild
